Description:
Zone-in on Size, Space & Single Level Seclusion
Find peace and solitude in a prized McKinnon zone cul de Sac. Set peacefully at the rear of a long gated driveway, this red brick residence sets the pace for lifestyle ease with a choice of maintenance free outdoor zones front and back, an expansive bay windowed living room in-between and a quality tiled kitchen and meals area with Blanco appliances, ample bench and cupboard space.
Sleekly styled through 3 robed bedrooms with a stylish ensuite for the master (WIR), a main family bathroom and a laundry with courtyard access, this stunning family home enjoys the comforts of ducted heating, split system air con and a large single lock up garage with both internal and external access.
Move in and enjoy single level seclusion or take this solid home to a new level with a designer makeover or alternatively invest in a prestigious McKinnon Zone address - located moments to Joyce park & North Roads cosmopolitan precinct, minutes to Ormond train station and the back gates of the College and a short drive to GESAC. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.
Insights: 2/26 Wicklow Street, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 3 bedroom unit in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Near New, Luxe Living in the Mckinnon Zone
Hideaway in the heart of it all! A showpiece of secluded space, a luxurious finish and distinctive design, this dual bedroom, dual bathroom, dual level townhouse is a rare Ormond offering for first homebuyers, professionals and shrewd investors in a quiet McKinnon Zone location.
Situated within completely private resort style surrounds, this near new home welcomes a broad ground floor open plan domain comprising elite Euro appliances for the sleek stone kitchen, informal lounge and dining areas, a family laundry, separate powder room and dual access to a maintenance free courtyard garden.
Magnificent design sees a first floor retreat provide mirrored built in robes for both bedrooms, a stylish ensuite and additional walk in robes for the master, a main tiled bathroom and a wide study nook.
Luxe appointed with polished parquetry floors, plush carpets, ducted heating and cooling and an auto lock up garage with internal access and clever storage, this is deluxe living in a smart zone location, positioned between Ormond and McKinnon's shopping strip and station, within proximity to several parks and a minute drive to the gates of the College. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.
Insights: 4/50 Glen Orme Avenue, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2016 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Period Beauty in the Zone & on the Hill!
Residing on 690sqm approx on Ormond's historic hill precinct, this prized 3 bedroom Californian Bungalow combines the best of the old and new amidst a private garden sanctuary.
Graced with a wealth of period detail (including lavish leadlight, high, ornate ceilings and an open fireplace) and respectfully renovated with luxe bathrooms including an ensuite for the master and a Caesar Stone and ILVE appliance kitchen.
Designed for harmonious family living with clever two-way access to the expansive formal lounge, this captivating home provides a rear family domain that blends seamlessly with a covered alfresco area and a large 3 car garage with space and flexibility for a workshop, studio or self contained living retreat.
Then turn to the full family-sized gardens and discover lush hedges for privacy, lawns to play, ample off street parking and a smart, fenced off utility garden.
Rewired, re-plumbed and restumped, this timeless home has all the modern comforts too with hydronic heating, split system air-con, 2 water tanks, streamlined storage space (WIR + BIR) and secure double gates.
Set within the prestigious McKinnon Secondary College zone and only moments to North Roads rail and retail strip, minutes to Centre Road shopping and a 15-minute commute to the CBD, take your place on a prized period streetscape and reap the rewards of a peaceful yet central locale. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.
Insights: 41 Queen Street, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2016 and 29 other 3 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Art Deco Home in the McKinnon College Zone
Captivated with character, this tastefully renovated 2 bedroom Art Deco treasure infuses its crisp, white, fresh feel with a warming relaxed ambience of homely charm.
Gorgeous with its polished boards, picture rails and high intricate ceilings, this mesmerizing gem enjoys a welcoming entry hall with storage, 2 delightful bedrooms (main with BIRs), bright bathroom, a timeless lounge and dining room (potential OFP), casual kitchen with Bosch dishwasher, a café bar and meals area overlooking the leafy rear garden, and a hidden Euro laundry on the covered alfresco deck.
In lovely cottage gardens with a vine-covered pergola, this idyllic heart warmer gives you room to extend if desired, complete with ducted heating, security doors, garden shed and an auto rear roller door to secure parking.
And what a location! In the McKinnon Secondary College zone. Ideally located and a minute's walk to cafes, restaurants, shops, transport and amenities and metres to the MonashUni bus, Ormond station, and a choice of local schools.
Insights: 616 North Road, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2016 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Excellent Entry in the McKinnon Zone
Step up in style, downsize with nothing to do or invest in a prime McKinnon zone location, this lifestyle opportunity will inspire the most discerning buyer.
Set within a gorgeous garden group of 10, this updated apartment is sized up with extra-large living opening to a first-floor balcony and robe-fitted double bedrooms with a sunny north orientation. Appointed with Caesar Stone benches and CHEF appliances for the eat in kitchen, this home has the comfort of panel heating and split system air conditioning, the security of intercom entry and a rear garage, a sleek fully tiled bathroom with laundry facilities and glossy parquetry floors.
Edging Ormond's cosmopolitan restaurant & retail strip, just moments to zone 1 and 2 transport and an easy commute to bayside beaches & Chadstone Shopping Centre, this where educational opportunity meets high amenity!

Description:
Convenient Villa Lifestyle will Appeal
This updated charming and bright 2 bedroom villa unit is an ideal lifestyle choice for new home owners, downsizers and investors alike. Set towards the rear in a boutique complex of only 5, this comfortable residence is conveniently positioned on an attractive tree-lined street, close to Carnegie, Glenhuntly and Bentleigh shopping precincts, multiple transport options, parks and quality schools. 10 min to Chadstone shopping centre.
2 double bedrooms (BIR)
Living and dining, Heat/Cool
Functional kitchen with meals
Central bathroom (Bath & Shower)
Separate laundry & W/C, Polished boards
Sizeable courtyard & Carport on title
Easy walk to all lifestyle amenities

Description:
In-Zone, Low Maintenance, Lifestyle Living!
Love the lifestyle that this location delivers! Just off Ormond Village, stroll to the station or nearby Joyce & Allnut Parks from this low maintenance, street-front townhouse; pick up your morning coffee or last minute shopping...or walk the kids to numerous nearby schools (including in-zone McKinnon Secondary College & Ormond Primary). Safe, secure & single-level, there's two robed bedrooms plus study (or potential third bedroom), kitchen with dishwasher, meals area & gas cooktop, separate laundry and a handy two-way bathroom/ensuite. Freshly painted with new carpet, a high privacy fence & enclosed front gardens, extras include ducted heating, air-conditioning, auto lock up garage & external security shutters.

Description:
Period Perfect Living with a Triple School Zone Location
Offering a rare and highly valued position within the catchments of McKinnon Secondary College, McKinnon, Valkstone and Ormond Primary schools, zone in on this beautiful up to 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom period home and capitalise on this in demand address!
Already extended with a jarrah-floored open plan, this triple zone design reflects the finest contemporary elegance and the beauty of yesterday with high ornate ceilings, decorative fireplaces and Baltic pine boards.
Updated with a Caesar stone and Blanco appliance kitchen starring custom cabinetry, aligned with stylish bathrooms, this stunning single level extends even further through cafe bi folds to the ambient alfresco area amidst a private garden setting adorned by established trees.
With the family comforts of split system air con in 3 bedrooms, a formal lounge/4th bedroom, built in robes, heating, alarm and a lock up garage with space for a studio/workshop, move in with nothing to do but add up the value in the smartest family zoned location - moments to McKinnon Village and Centre Roads shopping and station strip, minutes to Ormond's cosmopolitan precinct and with prized parklands and GESAC in close proximity. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Super Spacious with Updated Comfort
Quiet at the back of the block, this neatly updated 2 bedroom first floor apartment is older in style with a young personality.
With loads of space to add your own style, this light filled retreat features 2 large bedrooms (one with BIRs), a classic white bathroom/laundry with separate toilet, inviting north facing living & dining room, and a renovated kitchen/meals (stainless steel appliances).
A fabulous start to get your renovation juices flowing or a tidy investment to add to your portfolio, complete with gas heating, split system air conditioning, new roller blinds and undercover parking.
A lovely walk to Ormond shops, cafes, restaurants and the train station, with bus services to Monash Uni and Chadstone Shopping Centre close by.

Description:
Period-Perfect Entry to the Zone
Make an impressive entry to one of the McKinnon College Zone's period-perfect streets with perfect-sized land, perfect three bedroom accommodation and the perfect blend of comfort and potential. The original home on a sub-divided block, this enchanting period beauty has all the presence and charm of its grand period neighbours with the affordability and easy-living of a sub-divided block.
Following a traditional floorplan with a large lounge, an open-plan kitchen-casual area and big bedrooms (one with WIR), this inviting home is rich with period detail (including Baltic Pine boards, lofty strapped ceilings and a fireplace) and contemporary comforts including a new stainless-steel European dishwasher for the classic kitchen, a skylit central bathroom, ducted heating and air-conditioners.
Presented to rent or enjoy with enormous potential to add value with a designer makeover, there's a large fully-fenced garden and two car parking out front and a covered entertaining area out back. Close to the North Rd bus, a minute to the station and College, this is a simply perfect downsize, first-home, investment or value-adding opportunity ...at a simply perfect McKinnon Secondary College Zone, Ormond Hill address.
Insights: 1/11 Stewart Street, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2016 and 29 other 3 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Plans, Land & Ormond's Best Address (in the Zone)
Rewrite history in Ormond's historic hill precinct. High on the hill, well in the Zone and a walk to the shopping strip and station, the sale of this approx 507sqm site (with wide 21.58m frontage) is truly a step back in time! The last of the old market garden allotments, this perfect-sized site sits on the old orchard garden of one of the area's original Victorian mansions ...now it's ready to watch a family grow or to help grow wealth in a new era.
Offered with architectural plans for a substantial four bedroom, two bathroom, dual zone single-level family home with garaging and parking to the front and perfect-sized gardens all around, this exciting site also offers the opportunity to re-design and custom-build to your own needs ...with potential to capture broad views from a two-storey home ...or to capture the demand for prestige housing in the McKinnon College Zone with a clever dual occupancy development (subject to Council Approval).
See through the vision already planned for this prime site or step up and take a new view of arguably the area's best address. However you see the future for this grand old garden, there's enormous growth potential here!
Insights: 21 other 4 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Smart Single Level in the Mckinnon Zone
Find peace and solitude in the smartest of zone locations! Set to the rear on a big block of only two, this single level villa provides a versatile 3-bedroom 2-bathroom floorplan ideal for growing families and astute investors in one of Melbourne's most coveted precincts.
Appointed with built in robes for each bedroom, a timber vanity for each bathroom including ensuite for the master, this centrally heated and air conditioned home offers an extra spacious informal lounge/dining/family area met with a quality kitchen (new CHEF cooktop and dishwasher) and access to a secluded maintenance free courtyard and a lock up garage with storage.
On the edge of Ormond's rail and retail, with the Primary school at the door and a prime Mckinnon Zone address, appreciate the location of this single level stunner and look to add value with a contemporary upgrade. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Divine Art Deco, In the Heart of Mckinnon Zone
Positioned high between Joyce Park and the back gate to the College, make an affordable entry in fine art deco beauty with the smartest of zone locations.
Divinely deco detailed with high elaborate ceilings, polished boards and two open fireplaces, this accommodating family home offers formal lounge and dining rooms, a separate kitchen/living area and 3 spacious bedrooms (1 BIR).
Appointed with ducted heating, fan cooled living and a neat bathroom with separate WC, this captivating classic even has a quiet courtyard garden with a cottage style shed.
Move in, relax and cherish its charm or see scope to renovate and rejuvenate this tired abode and reap the in-zone rewards, just moments to Ormond shops, Mckinnon village and train, GESAC and a minute to Mckinnon Secondary College. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Yesterday's period charm: today's liveability
At the no-through end of a tree-lined street, and behind a picket fence, this well presented period charmer is packed with beloved art deco features yet it is bright and inviting to suit the modern lifestyle. There's nothing to do but move in and enjoy the comfortable surroundings. You'll be met by hardwood flooring, high ceilings, gorgeous ornamental ceilings and cornices, dark stained timber architraves and skirtings, picture rails and glass-inset internal doors. Off the entrance hall the lounge room has an open fireplace, and leads through to a modern kitchen (gas hotplates, wall oven, breakfast bar) open to the dining room, which also has an open fireplace. There are 2 bedrooms (main with A/C), and extras such as ducted heating, and a garage. A large covered deck, set in the private rear garden, beckons you out to relax alfresco-style. Convenient to North and Grange roads buses and to Ormond station and shops, as well as recreation, reserves, and Kilvington this property is also handy to Monash Uni (Clayton and Caulfield) and to Glenhuntly Rd trams.
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790

Description:
Executor's Auction - Corner growth potential in a leafy locale
Fronting two beautiful
tree lined streets in a highly sought precinct, this approx 546sqm property comes with a readily rentable two bedroom weatherboard period home, two generous street frontages (20m approx frontage on Walsh St) ...and exciting growth potential.
One of just a few under capitalised undeveloped corner sites in a high demand area, this versatile property is ready to achieve its full potential with a clever development (subject to council approval). Just a few blocks to the fast transforming Ormond retail and rail precinct, there's even the added value of proximity to McKinnon & Bentleigh cafe & restaurant strips, North Rd bus route, sought after schools, parklands and bayside beaches.
Bring your plans, let the already leased existing home with garage pay your way and watch your future grow in this leafy blue chip, low traffic and high amenity locale !
John Pollard : 03 9557 5500

Enjoying north-easterly aspects, this neatly maintained retreat features an entry hall with great storage, 2 good size bedrooms (BIRs), modern bathroom with laundry taps and a fantastic open plan living & dining area with balcony and vogue kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher.

Description:
Ultimate, Spacious Living in the Zone
Positioned high on Ormond hill, this stunning Californian Bungalow embodies old World charm and modern-day elegance over two magnificent levels. Graced with a wealth of period detail this highpoint home features high ceilings & Baltic pine floors, separate formal rooms (OFP), met with the wide entrance hall guiding through to airy open living/dining & a timeless timber kitchen with stainless steel appliances and breakfast bench.
A generous master suite (WIR/ensuite) is privately zoned downstairs whilst a 1st floor retreat accommodates 3 bedrooms each comprising walk in robes and split system air con, with a stunning bathroom and rumpus room to compliment the family-wise floorplan.
Outside welcomes entertainment and recreation space against a beautiful backdrop of groomed gardens, a central established apple tree & pencil pine hedges.
Divinely detailed with lavish leadlight, this spectacular home even has a fitted study aligned with the family comforts of ducted heating, ample storage and off street parking. A prized period masterpiece, matched with a premier McKinnon Secondary zone location, this enviable highpoint home stands in close proximity to Ormond station, Ormond Primary, parks, the village and train. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Charming Period, Approved Plans & in the Zone.
Charming three bedroom period home almost at the back gates of the College, this approx 700sqm property comes with a comfortable period home to inspire. Move in or re develop with the approved plans and permits for two cutting-edge 32sq street front homes designed by "Planar-Arc" architects. Graced with glorious period detail & spacious living, this solid home is ready to renovate or move in. The most exciting prestige home opportunity in the Zone is ready for you to purchase now. The approved plans offer cutting-edge architectural vision with four bedroom, 3.5 bathroom homes each with dual living zones featuring a choice of master-suite upstairs or down, living on two levels and deep decks stretching out into afternoon sun.
Renovate, rent or reap the rewards of one of the best sites in the Zone. There's no closer, more exciting opportunity in the Zone!

Description:
** AUCTION this Saturday at 3pm** Perfect Apartment within McKinnon School Zone
Upon entry through two rows of striking Birch trees and trim hedges, this tranquil apartment is a notch above the rest.
Perfectly positioned and exceptionally maintained this 2 bedroom 1 bathroom ground floor apartment is perfect for first home buyers and shrewd investors alike. Situated within easy walking distance to Ormond shopping strip, Ormond Zone 1 railway station and McKinnon School Zone, this apartment has much to offer. Both bedrooms feature built in wardrobes and are well proportioned. The spotless renovated kitchen features gas cooking with ample cupboard and bench space. Complimenting the kitchen is the light filled bathroom with laundry facilities.
Additional features include off street secure parking, heating, private outdoor space major road access to the CBD and schools and Universities. Move in and enjoy as is, possibly add your creative flair or lease immediately. The luxury of choice will be afforded to the smart buyer of this apartment.

Description:
Brand New Luxe Design in Mckinnon Zone
Commanding a versatile approach with family zoned living areas, superior living dimensions and high-end finishes, this brand new townhouse offers low maintenance luxury with nothing to do but relax, enjoy and reap the in-zone rewards. Sitting right on the edge of Ormond's cosmopolitan restaurant and retail strip, this highpoint home showcases vast open plan living with a sleek stone and Smeg kitchen featuring soft close cabinetry and easy access to a travertine classic stone laid courtyard with outdoor dining and easy care landscaped gardens. Highlighted with spotted gum floors and plantation shutters, this deluxe dual level, provides a 1st floor retreat with 3 bedrooms including a master with WIR's and ensuite. A masterful combination of cutting edge qualities and lifestyle comforts, with plush carpets for each bedroom, porcelain tiles for both bathrooms and split system air con throughout. Appointed with Auto gated entry to a single lock up garage with internal access and an off street park, this is the complete family lifestyle package with a Mckinnon zone address, a stroll to the village, Ormond station & moments to GESAC, parklands and beautiful bayside. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
"Queenlea' Palatial Period Home in the Zone
Arguably the best period home on a prized period streetscape, and certainly one of the biggest, "Queenlea" on Queen, captures the essence of modern luxury, combining an ultra modern renovation, a family-wise recent extension and generous accommodation over two levels. Set behind auto gates in manicured approx 700sqm grounds, this palatial up to 6 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom, Californian Bungalow welcomes Blackbutt hardwood floors, plush carpets and exceptional period beauty as you step through the regal entrance hall. Grand original rooms showcase an open fireplace and elaborate ceilings including a formal lounge/sitting room and home office.
Vast open plan living introduces a 3.5m caesar stone island bench for the elite Miele/Ilve kitchen, a jetmaster gas fire-warmed lounge and light filled dining enhanced by designer light fittings. Further extending beyond a wall of bi-folds, a full width merbau deck commands the ultimate al fresco experience with a built in gas bbq, integrated fridge and strip heaters for year round entertainment, overlooking a maintenance free artificial turf back yard and a solar/gas heated pool and spa.
Cleverly configured to provide a first floor kids domain with 4 bedrooms (built in robes) a medial rumpus room and a separate ground floor master (walk in robes and ensuite) ...this home even has a flexible rear pool house, adaptable as a bedroom (ensuite) or teenage retreat. Showcasing every conceivable appointment, audio-intercom and alarm provide streamlined security, whilst climate controlled ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, surround-sound system, an expansive butlers pantry, powder room and Foxtel contribute to easy care luxury living with a bonus single carport and off street parking for up to 5 cars.
See the original beauty, indulge in outstanding opulence and reap the rewards of a Mckinnon zone address, within a walk to North Roads cosmopolitan shopping, Mckinnon Village, parks and public transport. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.
Insights: 21 Queen Street, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2016 and 8 other 5 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.
